name: Project Boost (from GameDev.tv)
description:
[A,D] - Tilt [Left, Right], [W/S, Space] - Boost [Backspace] - Return to previous level
16 Levels Total

This Game is not my own idea. The Game comes from GameDev.tv's "Project Boost" from their Unity 3D lectures. Particle FX and the Thruster SFX were imported from GameDev.tv. All other SFX were downloaded from Pixabay.com. 

This is a quaint and challenging game where you have to balance your rocket and keep it upright while guiding your way through harrowing narrow gaps! In all, this was a fun little project and yes, I am aware of how janky and awful this "game" is, lol.
